Store

0000 - opcode
0000 - dest
0000 - src1
0000 - src2
0000000011111111 - value



--Store
00000011
00000000
00000000
00000011
store 3 in reg3

--Store
00000101
00000000
00000000
00000101
store 4 in reg4

--Read
00010000
00110000
00000000
00000000
Read from reg3

--Read
00010000
01010000
00000000
00000000
Read from reg4

--Xor
10100110
01100000
00000000
00000000
Add reg3 and reg4 into reg12
